titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [21. 5. 1936]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 197; Cambridge Letters, S. 273).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Mrs Thomson wants us, you & me, to come to tea to her to morrow. So I shan't come to you but meet you at the Thomsons (Lavender Cottage, 25 Storey's Way).
